events.message: The customer has reported a collision involving their vehicle and filed an initial claim to document the auto accident.
The claim has been reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the incident involving the customer's car.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims was assigned to the case to ensure focused follow-up and quick processing.
The customer was sent an acknowledgement confirming receipt of their auto accident claim and information on the next steps.
Request sent to the claimant for police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of the driver's license and registration.
The claimant provided all requested documents including the official police report and detailed photos of the damaged vehicle.
The investigation team began assessing the accident circumstances and verifying all submitted materials for accuracy.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of fault and full documentation supporting the claim for vehicle repairs.
A settlement offer has been prepared and proposed to the customer covering all repair costs and applicable deductibles.
The customer responded positively to the settlement terms, expressing satisfaction with the offer and the service provided.
Based on the investigation and customer agreement, the claim has been formally approved for payment processing.
Payment covering the approved settlement amount was issued and sent to the customerâ€™s bank account without delays.
The auto accident claim case was officially closed after successful payment and confirmation from the claimant.
The closed claim files and all relevant documentation have been securely archived for future reference and compliance.
